review: Hard time loading movies and shows - returned it.
author: Nathan A Seaman

review: Totally worth the money. Son wanted cable in room and this changed his mind. Games/Netflix he's a happy boy
author: vCard h xxx Dutch

review: You know I love it! I bought 2!  I bought my mom one first and then one for myself. I have a Roku but like this so much better and it is smaller and simpler to use.
author: L. H. Schrimsher "Lekezeal"

review: This thing does it all, from movies, to TV Shows, to Music, and Games, and it is very affordable
author: Trinergy

review: I keep getting a blue screen, then I need to unplug, replug. Every time I use it!
author: Karen J Beach

review: Love this product.  Very glad I purchased it.
author: Mickey

review: Fire TV Stick was easy to setup and easy to  use.  Downloading the app to my Kindle was even better.  Only complaint I have is more with Comcast I guess than with the Fire TV Stick and that is you can't watch videos on AE, History, or Lifetime.  Comcast isn't listed as a TV provider.  Hopefully that will be resolved soon.
author: Tania Monhollan
